mods.abstract: Male adult, Russian man, all hand-carved wooden doll ,painted features, mid-calf length robe painted with blue, black, and red stripes, upper robe painted with red stripes, head covering, standing on wooden plate. Accompanying information describes that this doll is hand-carved in Russia.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
